resources.string: Sense does not support ASCII passwords for WEP networks. Please enter your WEP key in hexadecimal format. If you aren’t sure what this is, please visit Support for more details.
Sense does not support WEP passwords containing “00”.
WiFi network passwords cannot be empty.
Could not connect over Bluetooth
Bluetooth must be turned on to connect to Sense.
Could not resolve characteristics from Sleep pill.
Your Sense is already linked to this account.
Your Sense cannot be paired to any more devices.
​Could not connect over Bluetooth
Could not detect a Sense nearby. Make sure Sense is plugged in, nearby, and in pairing mode. Ensure no other devices are connected with Sense over Bluetooth.
Sense not connected
Your Sense cannot connect to Wi-Fi. Tap below to troubleshoot.
Sense not seen recently
Your Sense was last seen %1$s. Tap below to troubleshoot.
Sorry didn\'t quite get that.\nPlease try again.
Sorry there was a problem.\nPlease try again.
Sense was unable to update successfully. Please try again
Update failed
Your Sleep Pill is already paired to an account.
Pill Pairing failed
Sense couldn\'t register your Sleep Pill. Please try pairing again. Try moving your Sleep Pill closer to Sense, and shaking it harder.
Sleep Pill not seen recently
Your Sleep Pill was last seen %1$s. Tap below to troubleshoot.
Sleep Pill not detected
Make sure to shake your Sleep Pill quickly for three seconds while holding it close to your mobile device.
Pill Update failed
There was a problem updating your Sleep Pill. Please try again. Your Sleep Pill will not function until the update is successful.
Connection lost
The connection to your Sense was lost.
No internet connection
Your mobile device is not connected to the internet. Check your internet connection and Wi-Fi settings, and try again.
Sense could not connect to the WiFi network. Make sure you‘re within range, double check your password, and try again.
Sense could not obtain an IP address on the WiFi network you selected.
Sense could not establish a secure connection with SSL to the server.
Sense is not provisioned correctly. Please contact support for directions.
We\'re having trouble connecting to the internet. Please check your connection or try again in a few minutes.
The operation could not be completed due to connectivity issues. Please try again.
Your Sleep Pill could not be Paired due to connectivity issues. Please try again.
Check your connection and try again.
There was a problem securely connecting to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
The operation could not be completed due to an internal error. Please try again.
Sense could not immediately upload available sensor data.
Your account could not be linked with Sense.
Sense could not be factory reset.
Sense failed to connect to your network to link your account.
Unexpected response received for command sent to Sense.
There was a problem displaying your trends. Please try again.
There was a problem displaying your insights. Please try again.
Unable to copy link
Sense was unable to pull a link for sharing. Please try again in a few moments.
There was a problem displaying your sensor data. Please try again.
You don‘t currently have a Sense connected to your account. Please pair with Sense to view current conditions.
Could not load graph.
Error
An unknown error has occurred.
Loading…
There was an error
There was a problem retrieving your Sleep Timeline. Please try again in a few moments.
Could not play sound
\n\nPlease turn airplane mode on for a few seconds, turn it off, and then try again. If this problem persists, please visit our support site.
\n\nHaving trouble? Contact support
\n\nNot sure? Contact support
Invalid email address
Invalid first name
Invalid password
Invalid registration credentials.
An account with the email address %1$s already exists.
The name you entered is too long.
The name you entered is too short.
Please enter a valid email address.
Email already in use.
Please enter a stronger password.
Passwords must be at least 6 characters.
The email address or password you entered is incorrect.
Please enter your email address and password.
The passwords you entered do not match.
The current password you entered is incorrect.
Your account could not be linked with Sense. You can try changing the WiFi Sense is configured to.
Failed to Link Account
Failed to stream video
Could not play video.
There was a problem displaying your alarms. Please try again.
You cannot set more than one Smart Alarm per day of the week.
You don‘t currently have a Sense connected to your account. Please pair with Sense to set alarms.
Please select a tone for this alarm.
Could not play preview.
Too Soon! The alarm you set is only a couple minutes away. If you want to test the Alarm, please set an alarm for a bit later.
Alarm could not be saved
You can not set more than 30 alarms.
There was a problem loading Sleep Sounds. Please try again.
There was a problem communicating with your Sense. Please try again.
There was a problem establishing a connection with your Sense. Please ensure your Sense is connected to the internet and try again.
An error occurred. Please try again.
Could not find a web browser.
Could not find app settings.
Could not find an email app.
Could not start camera.
Could not start photo picker.
Failed to upload photo
There were issues uploading your profile photo. Please check your connection or try again in a few minutes.
Failed to remove photo
There were issues removing your profile photo. Please check your connection or try again in a few minutes.
Device battery low
To continue this update, your mobile device needs to be charged at least 20% or be connected to its charger.
Sleep Pill out of range
Sleep Pill not found
